author: Alex
title: Looking for a sub for Wednesday's game
content: Hey everyone, I need someone to cover for me this Wednesday at 7 PM. It's a beginner-level soccer game. Anyone interested?

author: Jordan
title: Join our local tournament!
content: We're organizing a local soccer tournament next month. Looking for more teams to join. Contact me for details!

author: Casey
title: Tips for improving endurance?
content: Does anyone have good tips or resources for improving endurance for soccer? Would love to hear what's worked for others.
